component.name: xbPlay: Remote Play for Xbox
component.summary: Remote play from your console or xCloud

description.p: The xbPlay app lets you stream your Xbox One or Series X/S console to your Linux, SteamOS, Android, iOS, AndroidTV, LGTV (webOS) or FireTV device. It supports 1080p quality, backward compatible games, and XCloud titles. Haptic feedback is also supported on connected controllers. The xbPlay app is available on Google Play, Google Play TV, the iOS App Store, and the Amazon Marketplace (TV).
